title: Nissan in talks to buy France's Renault stake
text:
Nissan in talks to buy France's Renault stake   01:03 
After years of opposing France's influence on its partnership with Renault, Nissan may finally have a chance to deepen ties with its French counterpart. As Laura Frykberg reports, the carmakers are in talks with government officials over proposals by Renault-Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn for Nissan to buy the bulk of France's equity stake in Renault.   
After years of opposing France's influence on its partnership with Renault, Nissan may finally have a chance to deepen ties with its French counterpart. As Laura Frykberg reports, the carmakers are in talks with government officials over proposals by Renault-Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn for Nissan to buy the bulk of France's equity stake in Renault.  //reut.rs/2oY8Lgw
